answers.answer: You get very very gassy lol, that's about all it did to me =) I'm 37 weeks 4 days and now it gives me really bad heartburn.
Um I'm not 100% all that could happen but gestinal diabetes would be one.

It only really gives me heartburn and doesn't really help my constipation, but as far as I know it doesn't really hurt the baby. Just try and made sure there's some good stuff thrown in too, for all the nutrients and stuff thats not in the greasy stuff. :)
That was me all last pregnancy and nothing happened. Now this one it just makes ne feel sick.

If you want to get suuuuper technical, the current popular belief for what causes Autism is now when a mother ears an abundance of fasr food during pregnancy. The basis for this is that Autism occurs mostly in the u.s. with no real cases that cant be traced back to the u.s. so it has to be something we have here that other countries dont typically have so.... fast food got picked. BUT science honestly doesnt know  at first they blamed mercury in tuna, then a certain combo of the shots received shortly after birth and now fast food. So dont be surprised if you find reports linking fast food and Autism during pregnancy. It hasnt stopped me I just eat in moderation :)
Actually, your baby is most likely going to develop a taste for fast food. Meaning it could lead to obesity and a picky kid.
I've heard that it doesn't effect the baby. It would just effect you. Because the baby will suck all good good nutrients it needs from your body leaving you with a lack of.

question: Hey.! Mothers out there I wanted to ask you guys what could happen if you eat alot of greasy foods during pregnancy ? I tried to look it up but there weren't giving me any descent information so I wanted to ask you all.
title: wanting to know
